intro: Meratia yunnanensis, commonly known as the Yunnan meratia, is a species of flowering plant native to China. It belongs to the family Rubiaceae, which includes coffee and gardenias. The plant is characterized by its small, clustered flowers that are typically white or pale yellow. It is often found in moist, shaded environments such as forests and mountainous regions. Its leaves are elliptical and have a slightly hairy texture, contributing to its distinctive appearance.
